trans-unit.source: Maintaining a database does not take much work.

seg-source.mrk: Maintaining a database does not take much work.

target.mrk: Maintaining a database does not take much work.

trans-unit.source: If the database crashes, restart it.

seg-source.mrk: If the database crashes, restart it.

target.mrk: If the database crashes, restart it.

trans-unit.source: If the database is slow, tell people not to put so much in it.

seg-source.mrk: If the database is slow, tell people not to put so much in it.

target.mrk: If the database is slow, tell people not to put so much in it.

trans-unit.source: Try to limit the number of records in your database. Too many records leads to confusion.

seg-source.mrk: Try to limit the number of records in your database.
Too many records leads to confusion.

target.mrk: Try to limit the number of records in your database.
Too many records leads to confusion.
